Simian - Similarity Analyser v2.2.24

Package au.com.redhillconsulting.simian

Interface Summary
AuditListener Classes wishing to be notified of checking events should implement this interface.
Block A block of code.
CheckSummary A summary of check statistics.
 

Class Summary
BlockMarkers Strings that mark the start and end of a code block.
BlockMarkerState  
Checker Performs the duplicate checking.
CompositeAuditListener Wraps a list of audit listeners ensuring each of them is notified of audit events.
DecoratorAuditListener Convenience base class for decorating audit listeners.
FileLoader Loads files into a checker.
Language Enumerates the various languages that control the behaviour of a Checker.
Option Enumerates the various options that control the behaviour of a Checker.
Options Encapsulates all checking options.
SimianCheck Checkstyle Plugin.
SimianMain Command line interface.
SimianTask Ant task.
SimianTask.Formatter Configures the type of formatting produced by the Ant task.
SourceFile Represents a source file that was processed.
StreamLoader Loads files into a checker.
Version Simple interface for holding the software version.
